title: Rainy night city driving with moderate speed and braking events.
caption: A white van drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with a pedestrian crossing the street.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). There are 2 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars and a bus driving in the same direction. The traffic lights are mostly green, but there is a red light at one intersection. The pedestrian is crossing the street at a crosswalk, and there is a large truck parked on the side of the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down and brakes when approaching intersections or pedestrians crossing the street. The driver is cautious and attentive to the surroundings, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic and weather conditions.
